MaterialType.Name: Carbon Fibre
MaterialType.Desc: Carbon fibre is cheap, light and plentiful, but doesn't offer much protection.

MaterialType.Name: Steel
MaterialType.Desc: Steel is a cheap and fairly heavy metal.

MaterialType.Name: Kevlar
MaterialType.Desc: Kevlar is a light and highly-protective material often used for armour.

MaterialType.Name: Composite
MaterialType.Desc: Composite materials made from metals, fabrics and precision alloys.

MaterialType.Name: Metasteel
MaterialType.Desc: Metasteel is a meta-material made by quantum-engineering steel to significantly increase its strength and durability.

MaterialType.Name: Nanomesh
MaterialType.Desc: Nanomesh is made from fine woven carbon nanotubes. It is light and very strong.

MaterialType.Name: Mithril
MaterialType.Desc: Mithril is an advanced alloy with exceptionally high strength and relatively low density.

MaterialType.Name: Adamantium
MaterialType.Desc: Adamantium is a weighty but highly resistant nano-engineered metallic substance.

MaterialType.Name: Etherealite
MaterialType.Desc: Etherealite is made from graphene-reinforced carbon nanotubes, merged with ultra-strong quantum-engineered aerogel to give high strength and superbly low density.

MaterialType.Name: Ultramesh
MaterialType.Desc: Ultramesh is made from fine carbon nanotubes, precision nano-engineered for maximum strength and minimum density.

MaterialType.Name: Silicates
MaterialType.Desc: Silicates

MaterialType.Name: Aluminium
MaterialType.Desc: Aluminium

MaterialType.Name: Tungsten
MaterialType.Desc: Tungsten

MaterialType.Name: Uranium
MaterialType.Desc: Uranium

MaterialType.Name: Water
MaterialType.Desc: Water

MaterialType.Name: Carbon
MaterialType.Desc: Carbon

MaterialType.Name: Rare Earth Metals
MaterialType.Desc: Rare Earth Metals

MaterialType.Name: Gold
MaterialType.Desc: Gold

MaterialType.Name: Copper
MaterialType.Desc: Copper

MaterialType.Name: Fabric
MaterialType.Desc: Fabric

MaterialType.Name: Plastic
MaterialType.Desc: Plastic

MaterialType.Name: Rubber
MaterialType.Desc: Rubber

MaterialType.Name: Crystals
MaterialType.Desc: Energy Crystals

MaterialType.Name: Titanium
MaterialType.Desc: Titanium

MaterialType.Name: Industrial Chemicals
MaterialType.Desc: Industrial chemicals

MaterialType.Name: Barkskin
MaterialType.Desc: Barkskin is derived from sentient plants and confers a small resistance against poison.

MaterialType.Name: Chitin
MaterialType.Desc: Chitin is fashioned from the carapace of certain creatures and makes a tough armour, resistant to physical attacks.

MaterialType.Name: Heavy Chitin
MaterialType.Desc: Chitin is fashioned from the carapace of certain creatures and makes a tough armour, resistant to physical attacks.

MaterialType.Name: Vulcanin
MaterialType.Desc: Vulcanin is fashioned from the skin of extremely rare fire-resistant creatures, and makes a tough armour.

MaterialType.Name: Cryoleather
MaterialType.Desc: Cryoleather is fashioned from the skin of extremely rare cold-resistant creatures, and makes a tough armour.

MaterialType.Name: Xenolite
MaterialType.Desc: Xenolite is fashioned from the skin of extremely rare acid-resistant creatures, and makes a tough armour.

MaterialType.Name: Voidskin
MaterialType.Desc: Voidskin is fashioned from the hide of extremely rare void creatures. It is highly resistant and lightweight.

MaterialType.Name: Shadowskin
MaterialType.Desc: Shadowskin is a light and strong material fashioned from the hide of extremely rare shadow creatures. It oozes darkness.

MaterialType.Name: Nanosilk
MaterialType.Desc: Nanosilk is an extremely strong thread woven by rare species of giant spiders.

MaterialType.Name: Acid Blood
MaterialType.Desc: Acidic blood taken from the corpse of an alien beast.

MaterialType.Name: Poison Gland
MaterialType.Desc: The poison gland from an alien creature.

MaterialType.Name: Slime Egg
MaterialType.Desc: The slime-covered egg from a slime creature.

MaterialType.Name: Incendiary Bulb
MaterialType.Desc: The highly volatile organ from a fire-breathing creature.

MaterialType.Name: Frost Gland
MaterialType.Desc: A cold, pulsating blue organ from a cold-dwelling creature.

MaterialType.Name: Demon Blood
MaterialType.Desc: The hot, deep red blood of a vicious demon.

MaterialType.Name: Hive Brainstem
MaterialType.Desc: The warm, pulsating mass of neurons from the heart of a hive brain.

MaterialType.Name: AI Processor
MaterialType.Desc: The central processing unit of a rogue mechanoid.

MaterialType.Name: Crystal Heart
MaterialType.Desc: The scintillating heart of a crystal alpha.

MaterialType.Name: Subspace Shard
MaterialType.Desc: A mysterious shard from the subspace void.

MaterialType.Name: Triffid Root
MaterialType.Desc: A section of fibrous, regenerating root from a triffid mother plant.

MaterialType.Name: Shadowscale
MaterialType.Desc: The dark, cold and fathomless scale from a shadow dragon.

MaterialType.Name: Xenomorph Egg
MaterialType.Desc: The revolting, putrid, acidic egg of a Xenomorph.

MaterialType.Name: Celestial Essence
MaterialType.Desc: The rich, glowing dust shed by a celestial creature.
